motion_phases.description: The agent moves their hand toward the cutting tool and the object to be cut.
The agent securely grasps the cutting tool with an appropriate grip.
The agent positions the knife over the object, ensuring alignment.
The agent applies force to the knife to begin cutting through the object.
The agent continues cutting with consistent pressure, maintaining control.
The agent completes the cut, separating the object into desired parts.
The agent releases the tool and completes the action.

real_time_feedback_mechanisms.description: Monitors the alignment of the cutting tool and checks the cut's accuracy in real time.
Senses resistance from the object to guide the agent in adjusting force or motion.

The sound of the cutting process indicates whether the tool is cutting efficiently or if adjustments are needed.
